dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.tip.SapSpecification
dataStructure.description:
Defines a set of attributes and (optionally) associated values that may be applied to one or more service access points.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SapSpecification

child.name: type
child.description:
Method to group SAP Specifications that have strongly marked and readily defined similarities.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: type
